name: Rock Lobster (blueriverwood)
description:
The Nephropidae were the hottest lobster band until their abrupt retirement a few years ago.

Now, you have the chance to reunite the whole band. Show them your best moves as you nail through their hits!

Directions

Each song has notes to hit using the arrow pads. By default, use the Arrow Keys to control the pads (can be changed in options menu).

For regular notes, simply tap the respective key to hit them. For sustained notes, press and hold the respective key, letting go when the sustain is finished.

The better you time your hits to the notes, the more score you get! Your final rank is determined by your hit accuracy.

To skip through cutscenes, simply press and hold the Escape key.

Credits

(More detail in-game).

  • Gie - Art, Design, Programming
  • Chips Hagenauer - Music, Writing
  • Malong Le - Programming, Music
  • Matthew Nie - Art, Design

Special Thanks to:

GamesPlusJames tutorials, for helping us to kickstart the rhythm game concept in Unity. This project uses a few assets from his rhythm game tutorial.
